description:
Strip CRs from *.exe.manifest that have them

As previously reported in http://crbug.com/128744,
our commit queue cannot deal with files ending with CR/LF.
This CL strips CRs from some *.exe.manifest so that
https://codereview.chromium.org/18477012/ can be
committed via commit queue.

BUG=259228
R=jochen@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=212029

messages.text:
On 2013/07/17 13:42:39, jochen wrote:
> lgtm

Hi,

FYI: I'm dcommitting this issue on behalf of Yohei, because this CL needs to be docommitted to avoid CQ issue (as the description says), but he is not yet a chromium committer.

Thanks,
- hidehiko
Committed patchset #2 manually as r212029 (presubmit successful).

subject: Strip CRs from *.exe.manifest that have them
